name: TCAF Kate Beaton Dress Up!!
description:
The Toronto Comic Arts Festival happens this year at the Toronto Reference Library on May 14th and 15th, 2016! Get ready to go with the character from our adorable poster by Kate Beaton. Hope to see you there!

www.torontocomics.com

TCAF Poster Artwork
KATE BEATON (harkavargrant.com)

Game Design & Programming
KIM HOANG (lovelovehill.com)

Music
"Two Finger Johnny" by
KEVIN MacLEOD (incompetech.com)
